page.title: 17LIFE STYLES.PEOPLE OF AREA.
page.content: Interview of Chairlady of Barrowby Parish Council with reference to our map block only by W.I.Denton. Amenities. This area has electricity,mains water but only cesspits.There are no public bus service,trains,shops or schools on this map ref.Tradesmen are milk,pork butcher,butcher and greengrocer.The agricultural land is intensively used by farmers and the farms are owned by large concerns e.g.an Insurance Co., a hospital trust and two business people in two of the farmhouses.Two farm workers live in cottages.Other cottages have been modernised and let. On retirement farm workers are housed in Barrowby.Children over ll years old are sent in a special bus to Grantham schools.
